data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea obovata (Sibirean spruce) from sample NADIMPCO-11

Exposition E, Slope 3 deg, Geology: Moräne-Silikat, Tree line -70 m, av. Tree height 10 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 5%, Moss cover 100%, Vegatation type: Fi-Lä-Wald mit Torfmoos, Film number: 875A
